text: So again, how would you say, can you give it to me?

What is the word for we in French?
Nous.

What is he wants in French, he wants?
Il veut.

Il veut me le donner.

Il veut nous les donner.

Vous.
Which can also be used for to you.
So how would you say, he wants to give it to you?
Il veut vous le donner.

He doesn't want to give them to you.
Il ne veut pas vous les donner.
